Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a blog article with associated content.

content.description: The main text content of the article, formatted as HTML or plain text.

imageUrl.description: URL of the associated image for the article.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the article was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the article was last updated.

Video.title: Video
Video.description: Represents a video uploaded by the admin.

videoUrl.description: URL of the video file or YouTube link.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of the video thumbnail image.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the video was uploaded.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the video was last updated.

LiveMeeting.title: LiveMeeting
LiveMeeting.description: Represents a live meeting announcement with links to social media platforms.

id.description: Unique identifier for the live meeting.

youtubeUrl.description: URL for the YouTube live stream.

facebookUrl.description: URL for the Facebook live stream.

twitterUrl.description: URL for the X (Twitter) live stream.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the live meeting was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the live meeting was last updated.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course containing a series of lessons.

description.description: A summary of the course content.

thumbnailUrl.description: URL of the course thumbnail image.

lessonCount.description: Total number of lessons in the course.

Lesson.title: Lesson
Lesson.description: Represents a single lesson within a course.

youtubeUrl.description: URL of the lesson video on YouTube.

order.description: The sequence number of the lesson within the course.

articles.description: Stores articles uploaded by the admin.

videos.description: Stores videos uploaded by the admin.

liveMeetings.description: Stores information about live meeting sessions.

/courses/{courseId}/lessons/{lessonId}.description: Stores the individual lessons for a specific course.
